announcement.Text: &4&l For your account security, Chimera no longer provides "Mark Dungeon Star Mob" since version v0.0.5+(more see detail Information)

detail.Text: &b Because "Mark Dungeon Star Mob" may let you get ban, So For your account security,&4&l So Since version v0.0.5+ Chimera no longer provides "Mark Dungeon Star Mob"
